channel.title: Selecting random value from enum

item.title: Selecting random value from enum
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Ok, so I need to select a random value from a range of enums for slayer base. Anyone have any clue how to do that?

public void giveEasyTask() { for(Task t: EnumSet.range(Task.GOBLIN, Task.BANSHEE)) { //random selecting of enum between range here } }
Thanks in advance.
